nodes.text: Cyrlus was a XQ3 Platform used by the Rebel Alliance.

The Cyrlus was the third of three Rebel platforms that were attacked by TIE Bombers launched from the Nebulon-B frigate Implacable. Although defended by Z-95 Headhunters Casper and reinforced by the Mon Calamari Cruiser Ossus Day. The platform was destroyed in the end. The mission was recreated into the Combat chamber to train future pilots, one of those was Maarek Stele.
